alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 27 at 7:31AM MST until November 28 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations 1 to 2 inches below 3500 feet. Elevations above 3500 feet will see 4 to 8 inches of additional snow. Winds will gust as high as 45 to 50 mph in the mountains this morning. * WHERE...Sandpoint, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Eastport, Bonners Ferry, Athol, and Priest River. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
